scripts.chore:build: microbundle src/index.ts  --no-sourcemap -o ./dist -f modern  --raw true --compress false --tsconfig tsconfig.json
scripts.build:core: npm run chore:build -- --cwd . && npm run chore:move-types -- .
scripts.build:autocomplete: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/autocomplete && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/autocomplete
scripts.build:container: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/container && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/container
scripts.build:hooks: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/hooks && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/hooks
scripts.build:http: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/http && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/http
scripts.build:input: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/input && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/input
scripts.build:theme: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/theme && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/theme
scripts.build:button: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/button && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/button
scripts.build:skeleton: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/skeleton && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/skeleton
scripts.build:classnames: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/classnames && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/classnames
scripts.build:base-dom: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/base-dom && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/base-dom
scripts.build:form: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/form && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/form
scripts.build:router: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/router && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/router
scripts.build:loading: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/loading && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/loading
scripts.build:alerts: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/alerts && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/alerts
scripts.build:tooltip: npm run chore:build -- --cwd ./packages/tooltip && npm run chore:move-types -- ./packages/tooltip
